## `r emo::ji("package")` R Packages

These are all hosted on GitHub; none are on CRAN. Install with `remotes::install_github()`. You can find a refined selection of the (possibly?) more useful ones on [my R-universe page](https://matt-dray.r-universe.dev/ui#builds). The source for the hex logos is [my matt-dray/stickers repo](https://github.com/matt-dray/stickers).
